Class ProductDAO

java.lang.Object
com.group18.dao.ProductDAO
public class ProductDAO extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) for managing product-related operations including retrieving, adding, updating, deleting products, and managing stock levels.

  • Method Details

    • findById

      public Product findById(int productId)
      Retrieves a product by its ID.
      Parameters:
      productId - the ID of the product
      Returns:
      the Product object corresponding to the specified ID, or null if not found

    • getAllProducts

      public List<Product> getAllProducts()
      Retrieves all products from the database.
      Returns:
      a list of all Product objects

    • getProductsByType

      public List<Product> getProductsByType(String type)
      Retrieves all products of a specified type.
      Parameters:
      type - the product type to filter by
      Returns:
      a list of Product objects matching the specified type

    • decreaseStock

      public boolean decreaseStock(int productId, int quantity)
      Decreases the stock of a product by a specified quantity.
      Parameters:
      productId - the ID of the product
      quantity - the quantity to decrease
      Returns:
      true if the stock was successfully decreased, false otherwise

    • increaseStock

      public boolean increaseStock(int productId, int quantity)
      Increases the stock of a product by a specified quantity.
      Parameters:
      productId - the ID of the product
      quantity - the quantity to increase
      Returns:
      true if the stock was successfully increased, false otherwise

    • addProduct

      public Product addProduct(Product product)
      Adds a new product to the database.
      Parameters:
      product - the Product object to be added
      Returns:
      the added Product object, or null if the product could not be added

    • deleteProduct

      public boolean deleteProduct(int productId)
      Deletes a product from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      productId - the ID of the product to be deleted
      Returns:
      true if the product was successfully deleted, false otherwise

    • updateProduct

      public Product updateProduct(Product product)
      Updates an existing product in the database.
      Parameters:
      product - the Product object with updated details
      Returns:
      the updated Product object, or null if the update failed

    • hasActiveOrders

      public boolean hasActiveOrders(Product product)
      Checks if a product has active orders that are not processed.
      Parameters:
      product - the Product object to check
      Returns:
      true if the product has active orders, false otherwise

    • extractProductFromResultSet

      private Product extractProductFromResultSet(ResultSet rs) throws SQLException
      Extracts a Product object from a ResultSet.
      Parameters:
      rs - the ResultSet containing the product data
      Returns:
      the Product object extracted from the ResultSet
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while extracting data from the ResultSet
